source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a powerful storm developing over a desert landscape. Massive, dark purple and gray clouds churn and swirl rapidly across the sky. A concentrated column of heavy rain descends in the distance, moving across the arid terrain dotted with saguaro cacti and sparse vegetation.
